settings.hero_heading: How To Use Fièra Luxury Concealer

settings.custom_liquid:
A Tutorial From a Hollywood Makeup Artist

Fièra Luxury Concealer has received media attention and praise for being the first formula of its kind for mature skin. You’ve likely never seen a concealer texture quite like it, therefore the way you use it is different than that of most concealers.

To help you get the best results with your concealer application, we’ve enlisted the help of Fièra fan and 2x Emmy-Nominated Celebrity Makeup Artist DeeDee Marcelli to provide this video tutorial.

Once you try your Luxury Concealer, please consider leaving us a positive review and 5-star rating on Amazon.

As a small business committed to customer satisfaction and charitable efforts (2.5 million meals and counting donated to those in need!), your reviews are extremely important to us.

If you have any questions or concerns with your order, or need any more support using the product, please contact our Customer Happiness Team at support@fieracosmetics.com to assist you (and keep you happy!) before leaving your rating.

Thank you, and enjoy the compliments that come with using Fièra Luxury Concealer!

settings.sec_box_heading: Join thousands of women who have discovered the long-term benefits of Fièra
settings.box_richtext:
Fièra’s scientifically-formulated skincare solutions help women achieve healthy, radiant, more youthful-looking skin. Maximizing and maintaining those visible results come with consistent and continued use, which is why we are happy to make it more affordable by offering a minimum of 25% off every order with our subscription service.

To protect and preserve your skin with quality, natural ingredients; improve elasticity, smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, visibly fade dark spots and firm the skin - take advantage of a Fièra subscription. This not only saves money, it saves valuable time, simplifies your skincare regimen and ensures you’re treating your skin to proven, effective and safe solutions.

*Save a minimum of 25% on every subscription order. Save 50% when you subscribe with the Buy 2, Get 1 Free option.

settings.box_heading: Save Up To 50% On Every Order

settings.text_info: Subscriptions are the best way to save on every order so you can maximize your skincare results while minimizing your investment. Simply choose the product(s) you wish to have delivered regularly. You can choose to have one shipped at a time and save 25% on every order, OR, take advantage of our Buy 2, Get 1 Free options and save 50%! You can choose to have the product(s) delivered every 1, 2 or 3 months. If you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so any time. You’ll also receive various freebies and discounts as a valued subscriber.

settings.faq_heading: How do I change or cancel my subscription?
settings.text_info: Should you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so by emailingsupport@fieracosmetics.comor by calling customer service at 1-833-693-4372. We will be happy to assist you with whatever you need. You can reach us Monday to Friday between the hours of 8 am - 8pm, or Saturday from 9 am - 5pm, Eastern Standard Time.

settings.faq_heading: How and when will I be charged for my subscription?
settings.text_info: The credit card you used for your first subscription order will be automatically charged at the time of shipping, and at the time of shipping for every future order, depending on your selected subscription. You will never be charged shipping for any subscription orders. The charge will appear on your billing statement as Fièra Cosmetics.

settings.faq_heading: How do I manage my subscription?
settings.text_info:
Login to customer account
You can access your customer portal through your store account login. If you have not registered an account, you will need to create an account using the same email address used at checkout.

Once your account is registered, you can log in and access your customer portal by clicking on the Manage Subscriptions link.

You can also access your account using a direct link to the customer portal. This link is normally sent in the Subscription Confirmation email when you begin a subscription and the Upcoming Order email.

settings.faq_heading: How do I update payment information?
settings.text_html_info:
• Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click the Payment Methods tab.
  • Click Add new payment method and enter the payment method details.
  • Click the Subscriptions tab and click Edit on the subscription to be updated.
  • Expand the Shipping and Billing section and click Use this shipping and billing pair to select the new payment method.
  • Return to the Payment Methods tab, expand the old payment method and click Remove payment method.

If you used PayPal as your payment gateway, you may be able to edit the payment method in your PayPal settings. Otherwise, you need to cancel the subscription and start a new subscription via checkout.

settings.faq_heading: How do I update my shipping address for a specific subscription
settings.text_html_info:
To update the shipping address for a specific subscription:

  • Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click on Subscription and scroll down to Shipping Address.
  • Click the arrow to expand.
  • Select one of the other shipping addresses.

Note: This only affects the shipping/delivery address, this does not update billing information related to the method of payment.

To update existing shipping addresses from the Shipping tab:

  • Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click on Shipping. This will display all shipping addresses on your customer account.

Click the link on a specific address will allow you to update it as needed or click on the Add Address button to add an address.

settings.faq_heading: How do I skip a delivery?
settings.text_html_info:
• Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click the Delivery Schedule tab to see all upcoming deliveries for your subscriptions.
  • Click Skip next to the delivery you would like to skip. If you want to unskip a delivery, click Unskip next to the order.

settings.faq_heading: How do I edit my next order date?
settings.text_html_info:
• Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click Subscriptions and then click on Edit.
  • You will be taken to a page where you can edit the next order date for your subscription.
  • Once you select the new charge date you can click on the Update next shipment date.

settings.faq_heading: How do I add a one-time product purchase to a subscription delivery?
settings.text_html_info:
One-time products can be added to your subscription order.

  • Log in to your customer portal.
  • Click the Subscriptions tab and select Edit next to the subscription you want to add a product to.
  • Hover over the product you want to add and select Add one-time. This automatically adds the product to your shipment.

    OR

    You can also add one-time products using the Add a Product button on the Subscriptions tab.

To manage or delete a one-time product:

  • Click the Delivery schedule tab.
  • Select Manage add-on.

settings.faq_heading: How do I cancel my subscription?
settings.text_html_info:
• Login to your customer portal.
  • Click Subscriptions and Edit.
  • Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click on the Cancel Subscription. If required, provide a cancellation reason and confirm the cancellation by clicking Proceed.
